text: 20|10|nowpel del( mou sa thveudamnaer) keat bankheunh ponluphleung muoy  haey keat ban pol towkean kruosaear robsa keat tha  chaur puok anak  now tinih sen choh  pitabrakd nasa khnhom bankheunh ponluphleung muoy sangkhum  tha khnhom nung yk phleung muoy dom mk bangkeat aoy puok anak  ryyka khnhom nung chuob kar changaoul  bangheanh nowkanleng ponluphleung noh .
